Html:
Happy new year:)

I have a problem with KIGG compilation. All required components are installed, but it seems that some classes are missing. All projects except Web compiles normally, but Web uses some classes or interfaces that are not exists: IDataContext, CompressFilter, CacheFilter, BaseStoryListData, StoryListByCategoryData etc...

Where can I find this classes? Maybe I have to add some references? Thanks, sorry for bad English))
I've found solution. Some classes were not included in Web project, but exists on disk. But I have no idea where I can find FilterExecutingContext class...
